Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him.`` You know, I love Eminem but... Chris Webber and Allen Iverson combined for 50 of the Sixers' 84 shots and made 25 of the 42 field goals.
